channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 05:51 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 05:51 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkivska_oblast' This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
